title: Forever - Roma
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Mexican, Fusion
description: Opened Apr 2015 an American-style restaurant offering vegan comfort food; has a 2nd location in the Polanco area. On the menu are dishes like breakfast pancakes and pressed juices. For lunch you'll find burgers and reuben sandwich, raw pesto pasta, and fusion Mexican food like coconut ceviche and caulliflower tacos. Has vegan cheesecake and ice cream, chocolate ganache.
